contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 19, 2005 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-championship-section
Test Piece Contest
Salome
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Rob Burnett, Solo Euphonium, Parc & Dare Best trombone - Tongwynais. Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 6 bands competed.
Jan. 4, 2010, 9:53 p.m. July 2, 2020, 11:14 a.m.
1 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Gareth Pritchard
2 Burry Port Town Michael Thorne
3 Parc and Dare Band Craig Roberts
4 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Alan Gibbs
5 Treherbert & District Band Graham Sheppard
6 Abergavenny Borough Band Alun Williams
